article_title: GOP congressional candidates spar in early campaigning

article_metadata.description: Republican candidates Dr. Neal Dunn and attorney Mary Thomas are sharpeningng their rhetoric as they campaign to run against incumbent U.S. Rep. Gwen Graham for the race for the revamped District 2.
article_metadata.author: KATIE LANDECK

og.description: Republican candidates Dr. Neal Dunn and attorney Mary Thomas are sharpeningng their rhetoric as they campaign to run against incumbent U.S. Rep. Gwen
og.title: GOP congressional candidates spar in early campaigning
